ygData.subject: RE: Deleting multiple items using REST
ygData.msgSnippet: Mike, I liked your elaboration on this. But I couldn t quite follow you with the 4th approach. (3)is to essentially DELETE the whole resource and add a filter,

Mike,
I liked your elaboration on this. But I couldn't quite follow you with the
4th approach.

(3)is to essentially DELETE the whole resource and add a filter,
?id=a,b,c,d; in (4) you do a POST, with the post values id=a,b,c,d? Would
that be to post an empty set to an existing ID?


Confused,
Matthias
